BriefDescription: Number of page faults [This event is an alias of page-faults]
Number of page faults [This event is an alias of faults]
Number of context switches [This event is an alias of cs]
Number of context switches [This event is an alias of context-switches]
Number of times a process has migrated to a new CPU [This event is an alias of migrations]
Number of times a process has migrated to a new CPU [This event is an alias of cpu-migrations]
Number of minor page faults. Minor faults don't require I/O to handle
Number of major page faults. Major faults require I/O to handle
Number of kernel handled memory alignment faults
Number of kernel handled unimplemented instruction faults handled through emulation
A placeholder event that doesn't count anything
An event used by BPF programs to write to the perf ring buffer
Number of context switches to a task in a different cgroup
